name: LARISSA DANTAS REQUENA
title: Full-Stack Engineer (Front-End Leaning) | React | TypeScript | Angular | UI/UX | APIs
summary: Front-End leaning Full-Stack Engineer with 5+ years of experience building and scaling user-facing web applications used by thousands of users. Strong background in React, TypeScript, Angular, and modern SPA architectures, with hands-on experience delivering end-to-end features across the stack. Comfortable working in high-ownership environments, collaborating closely with Product, Design, and Engineering to translate ambiguous requirements into intuitive, high-impact solutions. Strong interest in UI/UX, performance optimization, and building products that are both technically robust and delightful to use.
